text: Brandon Paul Flynn (born October 11, 1993) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Justin Foley in the Netflix series 13 Reasons Why. He also played Mike the Intern in BrainDead. He also appeared in the 2020 series Ratched. Flynn is openly gay. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from Florida Category:LGBT actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Miami
title: Brandon Flynn
